channel.title: I've been gone for a while and need to get caught up
channel.description: There's a few questions that I have after being gone for quite a while (I think over a year now?). Has anyone developed (and released) saving servers? Last I checked I had to restart every time I wanted to log in again, if not I will =P. Has anyone made a server with all skills? Are NPC's closer to being at the RS2 server's level? (tbh, last time I checked, that isn't very good, but its been over a year) Is there anything else I should be filled in on, I'm not sure how long I'll be around?

item.title: I've been gone for a while and need to get caught up
item.dc:creator: @zraffz zraffz
item.description:
@zraffz wrote:

RSC came a very long way.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mubby wrote:

blah bah7:

There’s a few questions that I have after being gone for quite a while (I think over a year now?). Has anyone developed (and released) saving servers? Last I checked I had to restart every time I wanted to log in again, if not I will =P. Has anyone made a server with all skills? Are NPC’s closer to being at the RS2 server’s level? (tbh, last time I checked, that isn’t very good, but its been over a year) Is there anything else I should be filled in on, I’m not sure how long I’ll be around?

Same here bro i went to NJ and forgot how to spell runscpe.

item.title: I've been gone for a while and need to get caught up
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

Guys, just because I seem like a “no-namer” doesn’t mean I am. Extacy is right, I’ve been here for about 2 years.

[quote=“casey., post:14, topic:247867”][quote author=blah bah7 link=topic=326879.msg2565425#msg2565425 date=1228358328]
um the date you registered was january 11, 2008. I’ve been here for almost a year more than you.
[/quote]
For one I was talking to Fire, and I had an account before this one :/[/quote]Same. But then again, you’re breaking a rule so yeah…

But basically, I do know what the good ol’ days were. I’ve been here before the first demonik (I forgot which version it was, I think v2) was released, I’ve even been here before Glass Dagger was released.

Read full topic

item.title: I've been gone for a while and need to get caught up
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

ephemeral:

If that is the case, then it must have been more than a year since you were here last time. Geminus started to be hosted in June 2007, and soon after that we added some crappy saving and loading. But it atleast contained it. Also, even RuneScape: Glass Dagger (1) had some saving and loading, and that was even longer ago.

well thats kinda weird… maybe i didn’t spend much time in this section lol. yeah, im gonna be back for a while, hopefully to touch up on java a bit more, so ill dl a source and see what its like =)

Read full topic

save/loading etc is long done.

Npc’s work like they’re supposed to, but i don’t think alot of people have made “quests” possible.
